pullRequest.title: Feature/task 519 refactor version cont
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added an interface for version control backends
Implemented git backend
Git integrated into UI

Remaining tasks are

SVN backend
SVN integration into UI

They will be done in a separate PR.
Closes #519

commit.message:
Add version control UI Commands and Git Command Handler- (Task #519)

---
Task #519: Refactor version control integration

Added initial git Backend implementation - (Task #519)

- Added Interface for Repository Access without UI
- Started implementing Git Backend based on jGit and eGit

---
Task #519: Refactor version control integration
Merge branch 'feature/task_519-Refactor_version_cont' of https://github.com/virtualsatellite/VirtualSatellite4-Core.git into feature/task_519-Refactor_version_cont

Implemented test handler - (Task #519)

- Now calling new functionality to commit and push.

---
Task #519: Refactor version control integration

Added access to credentials store for git backend - (Task #519)

- Added generic credentials in non ui code.
- Adjusted handler to take and use and instance of the EGit
CredentialsProvider

---
Task #519: Refactor version control integration

Add CommitMessageDialog to GitCommitHandler - (Task #519)

---
Task #519: Refactor version control integration

feature/task_519-Refactor_version_cont

	de.dlr.sc.virsat.team.ui/src/de/dlr/sc/virsat/team/ui/action/git/GitCommitHandler.java

Add GitUpdateHandler implementation - (Task #519)

Also fix bug of selected project root in GitCommitHandler.

---
Task #519: Refactor version control integration

First test case implemented - (Task #519)

- Implemented test case with two local and one remote repo
- Implemented commit from a Sei from Local1 via remote to Local2

---

exists before checkin.

Trying to fix repo to git provider mapping - (Task #519)

- test cases fail since mapping is not correctly identified.

Task #519: Refactor version control integration

Fixed dependency issue with executing all tests - (Task #519)

- Changed code for git backend tests to try to ramp up the egit plugins
as early as possible.
- Fixed some formatting in the abstract backend test class
- Enabled interactive osgi console in test launcher config
- Updated feature dependencies for not just svn but also egit and jgit
features

Managed to get test setup going - (Task #519)

Task #519: Refactor version control integration

Update test setup - (Task #519)

Solves the problem of being unable to have the same project (at
different file system locations) in one workspace:
- setUp now creates only one local project
- createTestProject now creates a subfolder with the corresponding
project name
- a new local project has to be created after the other one is deleted
in the test cases

nodes.bodyText: Let's maybe move getting projects from selection into VirSatSelectionHelper to reduce duplication?
Shall we maybe extract this job into an abstract class like VersionControlJob, where we can have all common code?
Let's move all fields to the top of the class
